action_type.display_value: NXP AUT GAF Request or Revoke

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Script step to get the Nxp id from sysid
Updating and Closing the request on successful execution of PowerShell step

sys_variable_value.value: close_notes=Access has been provided to the requested share. It may take an hour or so for changes to be applied to access the share^state=3
close_notes=Access has been provided to the requested share. It may take an hour or so for changes to be applied to access the share^state=3

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Automated catalog task for providing the access

sys_variable_value.value: Automated task to provide\Revoke access to requested Share for Normal Secure
Automated task to provide\Revoke access to requested Share for Normal Secure

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Get catalog variables from form

variable.display_value: Template Catalog Items and Variable Sets
Template Catalog Items and Variable Sets

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Updating and Closing the Catalog task on successful execution of PowerShell step

sys_variable_value.value: work_notes=Access has been provided to the requested share. It may take an hour or so for changes to be applied to access the share.^state=3
work_notes=Access has been provided to the requested share. It may take an hour or so for changes to be applied to access the share.^state=3

action_type.display_value: NXP AUT Request or Revoke access

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: PowerShell Step to Provide access to the requested Share
Asking for the approval from Share owner
Closing the Request once CTASK was closed

sys_variable_value.value: state=3^close_notes=Access has been provided to the requested share. It may take an hour or so for changes to be applied to access the share.
state=3^close_notes=Access has been provided to the requested share. It may take an hour or so for changes to be applied to access the share.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Assigning the Task for the manual process in case of failure on the PowerShell step execution

sys_element_mapping.value: work_notes=Problem in providing the access to the requested share. Assiging to Manual procedure. Please check and inform Automation team for error handling.{{0ed87ca5-2099-454c-9a73-fa3a674d9807.variable1}}{{0ed87ca5-2099-454c-9a73-fa3a674d9807.variable12}}{{0ed87ca5-2099-454c-9a73-fa3a674d9807.variable}}^assignment_group={"display":"WPS-RemoteDesktopSupport-HCL","value":"6ff2b3eadb49ba0024e8fb541f961948"}

work_notes=Problem in providing the access to the requested share. Assiging to Manual procedure. Please check and inform Automation team for error handling.{{0ed87ca5-2099-454c-9a73-fa3a674d9807.variable1}}{{0ed87ca5-2099-454c-9a73-fa3a674d9807.variable12}}{{0ed87ca5-2099-454c-9a73-fa3a674d9807.variable}}^assignment_group={"display":"WPS-RemoteDesktopSupport-HCL","value":"6ff2b3eadb49ba0024e8fb541f961948"}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Waiting till the support team closes the request
Updating the Request as reject with worknotes

sys_variable_value.value: state=7^approval=rejected^comments=your request has been rejected by the Share owner. Please contact Share Owner for the Reason and raise one more request for access if required.
state=7^approval=rejected^comments=your request has been rejected by the Share owner. Please contact Share Owner for the Reason and raise one more request for access if required.

logic_definition.display_value: Wait for a duration of time

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Checking the PowerShell output for success
